question:
Consider the following statements about the proposed National Urban Housing Fund (NUHF):
  1. The NUHF fund will be located in Building Materials and Technology Promotion Council (BMTPC)
  2. The fund aims to support the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. This NUHF fund will be situated in Building Materials and Technology Promotion Council (BMTPC), an autonomous body registered under the Societies Registration Act, 1860 under the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs. <u>Second statement is correct.</u> The fund aims to support the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojna (Urban). NUHF will also facilitate raising requisite funds to provide central assistance to Beneficiary Linked Construction (BLC), Affordable Housing in Parternership (AHP), In-Situ Slum Redevelopment (ISSR) and Credit Linked Subsidy Scheme (CLSS) by the government.
